title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7350.4 - Facility sanitation equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7350.4 - Facility sanitation equipment

State Regulations
(a) The facility shall maintain a sufficient
inventory of sanitation equipment. (b) All facility sanitation equipment shall
be maintained in good condition and stored in a safe and secure
manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7350.4

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
